I get a lot of NullPointerException when I enable the Fast Indexer on my project. I also got a ClassCastException.

See a stacktrace for both exceptions below:



I use CDT 3.1.0.200605151430 and the update manager tells me there's nothing

newer than the one I'm using.

I have fixed both of these. The NPE was due to the node not being connected to the AST. Could be a problem with the template instantiation.

The CCE seems to be due to the unanticipated participation of a constructor initializer in an ambiguity node.

I just updated to the latest CDT (3.1.0.200605290500) and now I get plenty of the following exception during indexing:

I had to truncate the stack trace (due to length restrictions on comments) but you can see it's a recursive loop.

instead of creating a new bug entry I just reopen this one. Hope that's OK
Lothar
